input.sentences: special visit from a location air force plane .
the playground on a cold winter day .
the house ready for christmas and new years .
the chair completely covered in snow .
finally went bowling all night long .
output.sentences: I took the grandkids out to the Air Force Base to look at all the planes.
On the way home, we stopped by the playground and let them run wild for a while.
Then we headed back to the house which was all decorated for Christmas.
They wanted to go out and play in the snow but I just wanted to take a nap.
After my nap, I took them bowling which was a fun way to end the day.
